snippet: OLNICK--Sylvia Nadel. The Olnick Organization employees extend our deepest condolences to the Olnick family on the passing of Sylvia Olnick, wife of the late Robert S. Olnick who was a prominent New York real estate developer and the founder of the Olnick Organization. Mrs. Olnick lived a wonderful and long life and was surrounded by people who loved and respected her. Seth Schochet, President of the Olnick Organization 1/3
lead_paragraph: OLNICK--Sylvia Nadel. The Olnick Organization employees extend our deepest condolences to the Olnick family on the passing of Sylvia Olnick, wife of the late Robert S. Olnick who was a prominent New York real estate developer and the founder of the Olnick Organization. Mrs. Olnick lived a wonderful and long life and was surrounded by people who loved and respected her. Seth Schochet, President of the Olnick Organization 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  OLNICK, SYLVIA NADEL
